title: Gamification-Based Science Learning Design: Effectiveness Analysis by Learning Style

context.prior_knowledge: Graduate-level scientific foundational knowledge and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Experimental study analyzing learning style differences among advanced science students in gamification environments

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to apply scientific problem-solving strategies at over 80% proficiency in a gamified LMS environment
Learners master core concepts of three or more scientific theories within a week through game mechanics (badges, leaderboards, quests)
They can explain differences in gamification effectiveness across learning styles (visual/auditory/tactile) with 70% accuracy

resources: LMS (Learning Management System) platform (built-in gamification features)
Gamification content templates for science subjects

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
